biotools.summary:
Gene expression based survival prediction for cancer patients.

Gene Expression based Survival Prediction for Cancer Patients – A Topic Modeling Approach.

This repository includes source code from the publication Gene Expression based Survival Prediction for Cancer Patients – A Topic Modeling Approach.

You can find the code for the MTLR algorithm here http://pssp.srv.ualberta.ca/home/about.
